translation_grid.chinese_original: 狮舞（Lion Dance）是中国最广为流传的民间舞蹈之一
translation_grid.option_a: Lion Dance is one of the most widespread folk dances in China.
translation_grid.option_b: The Lion Dance is one of the most popular folk dance in China.
translation_grid.option_c: Lion Dancing is one of the most widely spread folk dances of China.
translation_grid.option_d: The Dance of Lion is one of China's most widespread folk dances.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "dance" 应为复数 "dances"。C 项 "Lion Dancing" 不是标准说法，且 "spread folk dances of China" 表达不自然。D 项 "The Dance of Lion" 词序和表达不地道。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 狮为百兽之首，在中国传统中，狮子被视为是能带来好运的吉祥物
translation_grid.option_a: The lion is the king of all animals, and in Chinese tradition, it is regarded as a mascot that can bring good luck.
translation_grid.option_b: The lion heads all beasts, in Chinese tradition, the lion is looked as a mascot can bring good luck.
translation_grid.option_c: The lion is the head of hundred animals, in China's tradition, it is regarded as a mascot and could bring good lucks.
translation_grid.option_d: Lion, which is the top of beasts, in Chinese tradition, is seen as a mascot and bringing good luck.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "looked as" 应为 "regarded as"；"can bring good luck" 前缺少关系代词。C 项 "hundred animals" 和 "good lucks" 表达错误。D 项 "bringing" 非谓语使用错误。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 中国将进一步发展经济、扩大开放，这对海外企业意味着更多的商机
translation_grid.option_a: China will develop its economy further and open itself wider to the outside world, which offers more business opportunities to overseas enterprises.
translation_grid.option_b: China will further develop economy and expand opening, this means more business opportunities for overseas enterprises.
translation_grid.option_c: China will develop its economy more and enlarge its opening, that means more business chances to overseas companies.
translation_grid.option_d: China will have further economic development and opening expansion, it means more commercial opportunities for enterprises overseas.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "expand opening" 搭配不当；"this means" 造成句子粘连。C 项 "enlarge opening" 和 "business chances" 用词不地道。D 项表达臃肿，"it means" 造成句子粘连。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 假日经济的现象表明：中国消费者的消费观正在发生巨大变化
translation_grid.option_a: The phenomenon of holiday economy shows that Chinese people's consumption concept is undergoing great changes.
translation_grid.option_b: The phenomena of holiday economy shows that Chinese consumers' consumption concept is undertaking great changes.
translation_grid.option_c: The holiday economy phenomenon indicates: Chinese consumers' view on consumption is having great changes.
translation_grid.option_d: The phenomenon of holiday economy shows that Chinese consumers' consumption concept is having huge changes.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "phenomena" 与 "shows" 主谓不一致；"undertaking changes" 搭配不当。C 项使用冒号不如 "that" 正式；"having great changes" 表达不地道。D 项 "having huge changes" 不是标准搭配。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 端午节，又叫龙舟节，是为了纪念爱国诗人屈原
translation_grid.option_a: The Duanwu Festival, also called the Dragon Boat Festival, is to commemorate the patriotic poet Qu Yuan.
translation_grid.option_b: The Dragon Boat Festival, also named Duanwu Festival, is for memory the patriotic poet Qu Yuan.
translation_grid.option_c: The Duanwu Festival, also known as the Dragon Boat Festival, is in honor of the patriotic poet Qu Yuan.
translation_grid.option_d: The Duanwu Festival, also calling the Dragon Boat Festival, is for commemorating the patriotic poet Qu Yuan.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "is for memory" 语法错误。D 项 "calling" 现在分词误用。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 这些物理课不仅让孩子们享受了一堂知识与乐趣兼具的物理课，也显示了我国通信科技的前进
translation_grid.option_a: The lesson has not only offered children a physics lesson with knowledge and interest, but also shows the advance in communication technology of China.
translation_grid.option_b: These physics lessons not only let children enjoy a lesson of knowledge and fun, but also displayed the advancement of our country's communication technology.
translation_grid.option_c: These physics lessons not only offered children a physics lesson full of knowledge and interest, but also demonstrate the progress in communication technology in China.
translation_grid.option_d: These lessons not only made children enjoy a physics lesson with both knowledge and fun, but also shows the progress of China's communication technology.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "a lesson of knowledge and fun" 表达不地道。C 项 "demonstrate" 和 "full of" 虽可，但不如 A 项贴近原文。D 项 "made children enjoy" 生硬，"shows" 主谓不一致。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 上海是朝气蓬勃，充满活力，丰富多彩的现代中国的缩影
translation_grid.option_a: Shanghai is a dynamic, diverse and stimulating city - the very epitome of modern China.
translation_grid.option_b: Shanghai is modern China's microcosm, which is vibrant, energetic and colorful.
translation_grid.option_c: Shanghai is vigorous, full of energy and colorful, it is the epitome of modern China.
translation_grid.option_d: Shanghai, which is young, lively and rich-color, is the miniature of modern China.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "modern China's microcosm" 语序和表达不够优美。C 项 "it is" 造成句子粘连。D 项 "rich-color" 和 "miniature" 用词不准确。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 吸烟污染空气，损害健康，使肺癌发病率大大增加
translation_grid.option_a: Smoking pollutes air, damages health, and increases the incidence of lung cancer.
translation_grid.option_b: Smoking makes air polluted, harms health, and makes the rate of lung cancer greatly increase.
translation_grid.option_c: Smoking pollutes the air, damages health, and greatly increases the incidence of lung cancer.
translation_grid.option_d: Smoking leads to air pollution, damages the health, and makes lung cancer incidence become higher.
translation_grid.analysis: B 和 D 项使用了 "make + n. + v." 的结构，不如 A 项直接正式。C 项添加了原文没有的 "greatly"，A 项是最忠实简洁的翻译。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 越来越多受英文教育的海外华人父母，已经认识到孩子掌握中文的重要性
translation_grid.option_a: An increasing number of English-educated Chinese parents overseas have come to the realization of the importance of their children's mastery of Chinese.
translation_grid.option_b: More and more overseas Chinese parents who educated in English have realized the importance for their children to master Chinese.
translation_grid.option_c: Increasingly English-educated overseas Chinese parents have recognized the importance that their children master Chinese.
translation_grid.option_d: More and more English-educated overseas Chinese parents has realized the importance of their children commanding Chinese.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "who educated in English" 语法错误。C 项 "the importance that their children master" 从句用法不标准。D 项主谓不一致，"has" 应为 "have"。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 东方文明可以医治盛行于西方世界的一些顽疾
translation_grid.option_a: The Oriental civilization can heal some of the prevailing, stubborn Western ills.
translation_grid.option_b: Oriental civilization could cure some stubborn diseases that popular in the Western world.
translation_grid.option_c: The Eastern civilization can heal some of the stubborn sicknesses prevailing in the Western world.
translation_grid.option_d: Eastern civilization is able to treat some severe illnesses that are common in the Western world.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "could" 语气不确定；"diseases that popular" 语法错误。C 项 "sicknesses" 多指具体疾病。D 项 "treat" 和 "severe illnesses" 偏向医学层面，未能体现社会问题的隐喻。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 国际贸易的基本原则是平等互利
translation_grid.option_a: Equality and mutual benefit is the fundamental principle of international trade.
translation_grid.option_b: The basic principle of international trade is equality and mutual benefit.
translation_grid.option_c: The fundamental principle for international trade is equal and mutual benefit.
translation_grid.option_d: International trade's basic principle is equality and mutual beneficial.
translation_grid.analysis: C 项 "equal and mutual benefit" 中 "equal" 是形容词，与名词 "benefit" 不平行。D 项 "mutual beneficial" 词性错误，"beneficial" 是形容词。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 中国国际出版集团是中国最大的、最权威的外语出版发行单位
translation_grid.option_a: The China International Publishing Group is the largest and the most authoritative foreign language publishing and distribution establishment.
translation_grid.option_b: China International Publishing Group is the biggest and most authoritative unit of foreign language publishing and distribution in China.
translation_grid.option_c: The China International Publishing Group is the largest and most authoritative foreign language publisher and distributor.
translation_grid.option_d: China International Publishing Group, which is the biggest and most authoritative, is a foreign language publishing and distribution unit.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "unit" 不如 "establishment" 正式。C 项 "publisher and distributor" 未能完全对应 "出版发行单位" 的整合概念。D 项句式冗长，不够简洁。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 改革开放 30 年来，随着中国逐渐崛起成为政治经济强国，海外人士学习汉语的现象与日俱增
translation_grid.option_a: As China is rising as a political and economic world power, thanks to its three-decade reform and opening up, more and more people in overseas countries start to learn Chinese.
translation_grid.option_b: With China's rise as a political and economic power since 30 years reform and opening, the phenomenon of overseas people learning Chinese is increasing.
translation_grid.option_c: In the 30 years of reform and opening up, as China gradually becomes a political and economic power, overseas people learning Chinese phenomenon grows daily.
translation_grid.option_d: As China has been rising as a political and economic world power during the three decades of reform and opening, overseas individuals learning Chinese is on the rise.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "since 30 years reform" 表达错误；"the phenomenon...is increasing" 搭配稍显生硬。C 项 "overseas people learning Chinese phenomenon" 表达错误。D 项 "overseas individuals learning Chinese is" 主谓不一致。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 上海菜系是中国最年轻的地方菜系，通常被称为 "本帮菜"
translation_grid.option_a: Shanghai cuisine, usually called Benbang cuisine, is the youngest among the major regional cuisines in China.
translation_grid.option_b: Shanghai cuisine, often named as Benbang cuisine, is the youngest of China's major local cuisines.
translation_grid.option_c: Shanghai dish, commonly known as Benbang dish, is the most young local cuisine in China.
translation_grid.option_d: Shanghai's cuisine, usually referred to Benbang cuisine, is the youngest between the major regional cuisines of China.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "named as" 不常用。C 项 "dish" 和 "cuisine" 概念不同；"the most young" 语法错误。D 项 "referred to" 后缺少 "as"；"between" 使用错误。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 美国人强调效率、竞争和独创性，而中国人则将严谨规划放在首位
translation_grid.option_a: American people emphasize efficiency, competition and originality while Chinese people give priority to careful planning.
translation_grid.option_b: Americans stress efficiency, competition and original, while Chinese people put strict planning first.
translation_grid.option_c: The American emphasizes efficiency, competition and originality, however, Chinese people put careful planning on the first place.
translation_grid.option_d: American people emphasize on efficiency, competition and originality, but Chinese people give priority to careful planning.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "original" 是形容词，此处应用名词 "originality"。C 项 "The American" 特指错误；"on the first place" 应为 "in the first place"。D 项 "emphasize on" 中的 "on" 是多余的。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 武术在我国源远流长，是中华民族传统文化的瑰宝
translation_grid.option_a: Wushu, or Chinese martial art, can be traced back to ancient times. It is a gem of Chinese traditional culture.
translation_grid.option_b: Martial arts in China has a long history, and it is the treasure of Chinese traditional culture.
translation_grid.option_c: Wushu in our country has a long history, it is a gem of the Chinese nation's traditional culture.
translation_grid.option_d: Chinese martial art, with a long history, is the precious treasure of Chinese traditional culture.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "Martial arts" 过于宽泛，未特指 "Wushu"；"the treasure" 冠词使用不如 "a gem" 生动。C 项 "it is" 造成句子粘连。D 项 "precious treasure" 略显冗余。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 香港中文大学，简称 "中大"，成立于 1963 年
translation_grid.option_a: The Chinese University of Hong Kong, CUHK for short, was founded in 1963.
translation_grid.option_b: The Chinese University of Hong Kong, short for CUHK, was found in 1963.
translation_grid.option_c: Chinese University of Hong Kong, abbreviated as "CUHK", was established in 1963.
translation_grid.option_d: The Chinese University of Hong Kong, known as CUHK, was found in 1963.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项和 D 项 "was found" 意为 "被找到"，应为 "was founded"（被建立）。C 项缺少定冠词 "The"，且 "abbreviated as" 虽正确，但不如 "for short" 常用。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 过去 10 年，海平面升高和森林砍伐的速度都是前所未有的
translation_grid.option_a: Sea level rose and forests were destroyed at an unprecedented rate during the last decade.
translation_grid.option_b: In the past 10 years, the speed of sea level rise and deforestation are unprecedented.
translation_grid.option_c: The rate of sea level rising and forest cutting down in the past decade has been unprecedented.
translation_grid.option_d: Over the last ten years, sea level rise and forest destruction speed were never seen before.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "speed...are" 主谓不一致。C 项 "forest cutting down" 表达不正式，"has been" 与并列主语不一致。D 项 "destruction speed" 表达不自然，"were never seen before" 不如 "unprecedented" 简洁。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 为了切实保护儿童权益，中国的立法、司法、政府各有关部门以及社会团体都建立了相应的机制
translation_grid.option_a: To effectively protect children's rights and interests, China's legislation, judicial and government departments concerned as well as non-governmental organizations have set up corresponding mechanisms.
translation_grid.option_b: In order to protect children's rights, China's legislative, judicial, government departments and social groups have built corresponding mechanism.
translation_grid.option_c: For the effective protection of children's interests, China's legislation, justice, government departments and social groups have set up relative mechanisms.
translation_grid.option_d: To protect children' rights and interests practically, China's law, justice, government departments and social groups have set up according mechanisms.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "mechanism" 应用复数；"built" 不如 "set up" 常用。C 项 "relative mechanisms" 意思不准确，应为 "corresponding"。D 项 "according mechanisms" 表达错误。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 泰山的每个季节都有独特的魅力
translation_grid.option_a: Each season here has its beauty.
translation_grid.option_b: Every season of Mount Tai has unique charm.
translation_grid.option_c: Each season in Mount Tai has its unique attractiveness.
translation_grid.option_d: All seasons of Tai Mountain have their special charms.
translation_grid.analysis: B、C、D 项意思正确，但不如 A 项在上下文和风格上与原文参考译文匹配。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 青海省位于青藏高原北部，平均海拔 3000 米以上
translation_grid.option_a: Qinghai Province is situated in the northern part of the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau, with an average altitude of over 3,000 meters.
translation_grid.option_b: Qinghai Province locates in north of Qinghai-Tibet Plateau, with an average elevation over 3,000 meters.
translation_grid.option_c: Qinghai Province is in the northern Qinghai-Tibet Plateau, its average height above sea level is more than 3,000 meters.
translation_grid.option_d: Qinghai Province lies at the north of the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau, and has an average altitude of above 3,000 meters.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "locates in" 主动语态错误，应为 "is located in" 或 "is situated in"；"north of" 前缺少 "the"。C 项 "its average height..." 造成句子粘连。D 项 "at the north of" 表示 "在高原的北部（紧邻但不在内部）"，方位表达不精确。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 中国家庭十分重视孩子的教育
translation_grid.option_a: Chinese families place great importance on their children's education.
translation_grid.option_b: Chinese families attach great importance to their children's education.
translation_grid.option_c: Chinese families think children's education is very important.
translation_grid.option_d: Chinese families value their children's education greatly.
translation_grid.analysis: C 和 D 项意思正确，但不如 A 和 B 项使用 "place/attach importance to" 的搭配正式和常见。A 项是原文给出的标准翻译。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 立春（Start of Spring）是中国农历的第一个节气，标志着春天的开始
translation_grid.option_a: The Start of Spring is the first solar term in the Chinese lunar calendar, marking the beginning of spring.
translation_grid.option_b: The Start of Spring, which is the first solar term of Chinese lunar calendar, marks the beginning of spring.
translation_grid.option_c: Start of Spring is the first solar term in China's lunar calendar, and it marks the start of spring.
translation_grid.option_d: The Start of Spring, being the first solar term in the Chinese lunar calendar, marks the start of the spring.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "of Chinese lunar calendar" 前缺少 "the"。C 项 "Start of Spring" 作为专有名词，前面最好加 "The"；"China's lunar calendar" 不如 "the Chinese lunar calendar" 常用。D 项 "being" 多余，"the spring" 中的 "the" 可省略。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 南京长江大桥是长江上第一座由中国自行设计和建造的双层式铁路、公路两用桥梁
translation_grid.option_a: The Nanjing Yangtze River Bridge is the first double-decker rail-road bridge over the Yangtze River that was designed and built by China independently.
translation_grid.option_b: Nanjing Yangtze River Bridge is the first double-deck railway and highway bridge on the Yangtze River which was designed and built by China itself.
translation_grid.option_c: The Nanjing Yangtze River Bridge is the first double-layer rail and road bridge across the Yangtze River that was designed and built by China independently.
translation_grid.option_d: Nanjing Changjiang Bridge is the first two-layer railway and highway bridge over the Yangtze River that was designed and built by China on its own.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "double-deck" 不如 "double-decker" 常用；"on the Yangtze River" 指接触水面，不如 "over" 或 "across" 准确。C 项 "double-layer" 常指材料分层，而非桥的层数。D 项 "Nanjing Changjiang Bridge" 混合了中英文，不规范；"two-layer" 同样不准确。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 都江堰（Dujiangyan）坐落在成都平原西部的岷江上，始建于公元前三世纪
translation_grid.option_a: Dujiangyan is located on the Minjiang River in the west of the Chengdu Plain. It was built in the third century BC.
translation_grid.option_b: Dujiangyan sits on the Min River in the western Chengdu Plain, and was built in the 3rd century BC.
translation_grid.option_c: Dujiangyan is located in the Minjiang River on the west of Chengdu Plain, its construction started in the third century BC.
translation_grid.option_d: Dujiangyan, which is located on the Minjiang River at the west of the Chengdu Plain, was first built in the 3rd century B.C.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "sits on" 不如 "is located on" 正式；"Min River" 可能造成混淆，原文为 "Minjiang River"。C 项 "in the Minjiang River" 介词错误，应为 "on"；"its construction..." 造成句子粘连。D 项 "at the west of" 方位表达不如 "in the west of" 准确。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 普洱茶深受中国人喜爱，最好的普洱茶产自云南的西双版纳
translation_grid.option_a: Pu'er tea is deeply loved by the Chinese people. The best Pu'er tea is produced in Xishuangbanna, Yunnan Province.
translation_grid.option_b: Pu'er tea is deeply liked by Chinese. The best Pu'er tea comes from Xishuangbanna of Yunnan Province.
translation_grid.option_c: Pu'er tea is very popular among Chinese people. The best Pu'er tea is produced from Xishuangbanna, Yunnan.
translation_grid.option_d: Pu'er tea is deeply favored by the Chinese. Best Pu'er tea is produced in Xishuangbanna, Yunnan Province.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "liked by Chinese" 不如 "loved by the Chinese people" 程度深且正式。C 项 "produced from" 介词使用不当。D 项 "Best Pu'er tea" 前缺少定冠词 "The"。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 春节前夕吃团圆饭是中国人的传统
translation_grid.option_a: Having a family reunion dinner on the eve of the Spring Festival is a tradition for Chinese people.
translation_grid.option_b: Eating reunion dinner on the Spring Festival's eve is a Chinese tradition.
translation_grid.option_c: To have a reunion meal on the eve of the Spring Festival is a tradition of Chinese.
translation_grid.option_d: It is a tradition for Chinese to have reunion dinner before the Spring Festival.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "the Spring Festival's eve" 所有格使用不常见。C 项 "of Chinese" 应为 "of the Chinese people" 或 "for Chinese people"。D 项 "before the Spring Festival" 不如 "on the eve of" 精确。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 火锅是中国独创的美食，历史悠久
translation_grid.option_a: Hot pot is a unique Chinese cuisine with a long history.
translation_grid.option_b: Hot pot is a food invented by China, and has a long history.
translation_grid.option_c: Hot pot, which is a creative Chinese food, has long history.
translation_grid.option_d: The hot pot is a unique Chinese delicious food, with a long history.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "a food invented by China" 表达不自然。C 项 "long history" 前缺少 "a"。D 项 "The hot pot" 特指错误；"delicious food" 冗余。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 中国汉族人的全名由姓和名组成
translation_grid.option_a: The full name of Han Chinese people consists of a family name and a given name.
translation_grid.option_b: The complete name of Han Chinese is composed by a surname and a given name.
translation_grid.option_c: A Han Chinese's full name is made up of a family name and a name.
translation_grid.option_d: The full name of Han Chinese consists a surname and a given name.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "composed by" 应为 "composed of"。C 项 "a name" 过于模糊，未区分 "姓" 和 "名"。D 项 "consists" 后缺少 "of"。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 中国灯笼起源于东汉时期
translation_grid.option_a: Chinese lanterns originated in the Eastern Han Dynasty.
translation_grid.option_b: Chinese lanterns were originated from the Eastern Han Dynasty.
translation_grid.option_c: The origin of Chinese lanterns is the Eastern Han Dynasty.
translation_grid.option_d: Chinese lanterns first appeared in Eastern Han Dynasty.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "were originated" 误用被动语态。C 项 "The origin...is the Eastern Han Dynasty" 表达不准确。D 项 "Eastern Han Dynasty" 前缺少 "the"。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 由于通信网络的快速发展，中国智能手机用户数量近年来以惊人速度增长
translation_grid.option_a: Due to the rapid development of communication networks, the number of smartphone users in China has grown at an astonishing rate in recent years.
translation_grid.option_b: Because the communication network developed fast, the number of Chinese smartphone users increased at an amazing speed in recent years.
translation_grid.option_c: Owing to the fast development of communication networks, the amount of smartphone users in China has been growing astonishingly in recent years.
translation_grid.option_d: With the rapid development of communication network, the number of smartphone users in China raised at a surprising rate in recent years.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "Because the communication network developed fast" 表达不正式。C 项 "amount of smartphone users" 错误，"amount" 用于不可数名词。D 项 "network" 应用复数；"raised" 是及物动词，此处应用 "rose" 或 "increased"。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 公交车曾是中国人出行的主要交通工具
translation_grid.option_a: Buses were once the main means of transportation for Chinese people.
translation_grid.option_b: Buses were once the main transport tool for Chinese people's travel.
translation_grid.option_c: Buses were the main transportation for Chinese people to travel in the past.
translation_grid.option_d: The bus was once the main vehicle for Chinese people when they traveled.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "transport tool" 和 "Chinese people' travel" 表达冗余。C 项 "the main transportation" 不如 "the main means of transportation" 准确。D 项 "The bus" 特指错误，应用复数；"vehicle" 词义偏窄。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 黄山位于安徽省南部。它风景独特，尤以其日出和云海著称
translation_grid.option_a: Mount Huang is located in the southern part of Anhui Province. It has unique scenery and is especially famous for its sunrise and sea of clouds.
translation_grid.option_b: Huang Mountain lies in south Anhui Province. It has unique landscape, and is particularly known for its sunrise and cloud sea.
translation_grid.option_c: Mount Huang is situated in southern Anhui Province. Its scenery is unique, and it is especially famous for its sunrise and sea of clouds.
translation_grid.option_d: The Huangshan Mountain is in the south of Anhui Province. It has unique scenery, and is specially famous for its sunrise and sea of clouds.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "south Anhui Province" 前缺少 "the"；"cloud sea" 不是标准说法。C 项 "southern Anhui Province" 前最好加 "the"。D 项 "specially famous" 用词不当，应为 "especially"。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 长江 34
translation_grid.option_a: 长江是亚洲最长、世界第三长的河流
translation_grid.option_b: The Yangtze River is the longest river in Asia and the third longest in the world.
translation_grid.option_c: The Yangtze River is the longest river in Asia and the third long river in the world.
translation_grid.option_d: The Changjiang River is Asia's longest river and the world's third longest.
translation_grid.option_e: Yangtze River is the longest river in Asia and the third longest river of the world.

translation_grid.chinese_original: 在中国，红色通常象征着好运、长寿和幸福
translation_grid.option_a: In China, the color red usually symbolizes good luck, longevity, and happiness.
translation_grid.option_b: In China, red color often represents good luck, long life and happiness.
translation_grid.option_c: In China, the red color usually stands for good luck, longevity and happy.
translation_grid.option_d: In China, red is usually a symbol of good luck, long life and happiness.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "red color" 应为 "the color red"。C 项 "happy" 是形容词，与前面的名词不平行，应为 "happiness"。D 项意思正确，但 A 项与原文译文完全一致。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 乌镇是浙江的一座古老水镇，坐落在京杭大运河畔
translation_grid.option_a: Wuzhen is an ancient water town in Zhejiang, located by the Beijing-Hangzhou Grand Canal.
translation_grid.option_b: Wuzhen is an old water town in Zhejiang, sitting beside the Beijing-Hangzhou Grand Canal.
translation_grid.option_c: Wuzhen is a ancient water town in Zhejiang, which is located on the Beijing-Hangzhou Grand Canal.
translation_grid.option_d: Wuzhen, an ancient water town in Zhejiang, is located at the Beijing-Hangzhou Grand Canal.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "old" 不如 "ancient" 有历史感。C 项 "a ancient" 发音错误，应为 "an ancient"；"on the canal" 指在运河上，不如 "by" 或 "beside" 准确。D 项 "at the canal" 方位表达不如 "by" 常用。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 中国父母往往过于关注孩子的学习，以至于不要他们帮忙做家务
translation_grid.option_a: Chinese parents tend to focus so much on their children's studies that they do not ask them to help with housework.
translation_grid.option_b: Chinese parents usually pay too much attention to their children's study, so they don't let them do housework.
translation_grid.option_c: Chinese parents often concentrate on their children's learning so much that they avoid them helping in housework.
translation_grid.option_d: Chinese parents are likely to focus too much on their children's studies, and therefore not require them to do housework.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "study" 作为 "学习" 时是不可数名词，应用 "studies"。C 项 "avoid them helping" 用法错误。D 项 "are likely to" 语气不如 "tend to" 准确；"not require" 前缺少 "they"。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 中国是世界上最古老的文明之一，拥有丰富的文化遗产和壮丽的自然风光
translation_grid.option_a: China is one of the world's oldest civilizations, possessing rich cultural heritage and magnificent natural scenery.
translation_grid.option_b: China is one of the oldest civilizations in the world, and has abundant cultural heritage and grand natural scenery.
translation_grid.option_c: China is one of the world's most ancient civilizations, with rich cultural legacy and splendid natural views.
translation_grid.option_d: China is one of the oldest civilizations of the world, owning rich cultural heritage and magnificent natural landscapes.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "grand natural scenery" 搭配稍显生硬。C 项 "natural views" 不如 "natural scenery" 范围广。D 项 "owning" 不如 "possessing" 或 "with" 正式。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 大熊猫是一种温顺的动物，长着独特的黑白皮毛
translation_grid.option_a: The giant panda is a gentle animal with unique black and white fur.
translation_grid.option_b: The giant panda is a mild animal, has unique black and white fur.
translation_grid.option_c: Giant panda is a gentle animal which has unique black and white skin.
translation_grid.option_d: The giant panda, a gentle animal, with unique black and white fur.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "has" 前缺少连接词，造成句子结构错误。C 项 "Giant panda" 前缺少 "The"；"skin" 用于动物通常指皮肤，皮毛应用 "fur"。D 项缺少谓语动词，是句子片段。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 中国教育工作者早就认识到读书对于国家的意义
translation_grid.option_a: Chinese educators have long recognized the significance of reading for the nation.
translation_grid.option_b: Chinese educators have long realized the meaning of reading to the nation.
translation_grid.option_c: Chinese educators have long been aware of the importance of reading for the country.
translation_grid.option_d: China's educators have long recognized the significance of reading to the nation.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "meaning" 不如 "significance" 或 "importance" 程度深。C 项意思正确，但 A 项与原文译文完全一致。D 项 "China's educators" 不如 "Chinese educators" 常用。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 古人将狮子视作是勇敢和力量的化身，能驱赶邪恶、保护人类
translation_grid.option_a: Ancient people regarded the lion as a symbol of braveness and strength, which could drive away evil and protect humans.
translation_grid.option_b: The ancients saw the lion as the embodiment of courage and power, that can drive off evil and protect people.
translation_grid.option_c: Ancient people considered the lion as the incarnation of bravery and strength, which could expel evil and protect human.
translation_grid.option_d: People in ancient times viewed the lion as a symbol of brave and strength, able to drive away evil and protect mankind.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "that" 引导定语从句错误，应用 "which"；"can" 时态与主句不一致。C 项 "protect human" 中 "human" 作为名词应用复数 "humans"。D 项 "brave" 是形容词，此处应用名词 "bravery"。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 在唐代（the Tang Dynasty），狮舞就已经被引入了皇室
translation_grid.option_a: During the Tang Dynasty, the Lion Dance was already introduced into the royal family of the dynasty.
translation_grid.option_b: In Tang Dynasty, Lion Dance had already been introduced to the royal family.
translation_grid.option_c: During the Tang Dynasty, the Lion Dance was already introduced to the imperial family.
translation_grid.option_d: In the Tang Dynasty, the Lion Dance has already been introduced into the royal court.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "In Tang Dynasty" 前缺少 "the"；"Lion Dance" 前缺少 "the"。C 项 "imperial family" 不如原文 "royal family" 准确。D 项 "has" 现在完成时与过去时间背景不符。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 因此，舞狮成为元宵节（the Lantern Festival）和其他节日的习俗，人们以此来祈祷好运、平安和幸福
translation_grid.option_a: Therefore, performing the lion dance at the Lantern Festival and other festive occasions became a custom where people could pray for good luck, safety and happiness.
translation_grid.option_b: Thus, lion dancing became a custom during the Lantern Festival and other festivals, people pray for good luck, peace and happiness through it.
translation_grid.option_c: So, the lion dance becomes a tradition of the Lantern Festival and other holidays, for people to pray for good luck, safety and happy.
translation_grid.option_d: Therefore, performing lion dance in Lantern Festival and other festive events became a custom, which people use to pray for good luck, safety and happy.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "people pray..." 造成句子粘连；"peace" 不如 "safety" 贴近原文。C 项 "becomes" 时态错误，应为过去时 "became"。D 项 "in Lantern Festival" 前缺少 "the"；"happy" 应为名词 "happiness"。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 海外企业不仅帮助了中国企业的成长，而且也在合作中获得了收益
translation_grid.option_a: Overseas enterprises have not only helped Chinese enterprises with their growth, but also benefited from the cooperation.
translation_grid.option_b: Overseas companies not only helped the growth of Chinese enterprises, but also gained benefits from the cooperation.
translation_grid.option_c: Foreign enterprises have not only assisted Chinese enterprises to grow, but also obtained profits in the cooperation.
translation_grid.option_d: Overseas enterprises not only contributed to the growth of Chinese companies, and also got benefits in the cooperation.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "helped the growth of" 不如 "helped...with their growth" 直接。C 项 "obtained profits" 过于强调金钱利润，而 "benefited" 含义更广。D 项 "not only...and also" 搭配错误，应为 "but also"。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 中国政府将继续提供有利的政策和条件，推动中国企业与国外企业进一步开展合作
translation_grid.option_a: Chinese government will continue to offer favorable policies and conditions to promote the further cooperation between Chinese and overseas enterprises.
translation_grid.option_b: The Chinese government will continue to provide favorable policies and conditions for promoting further cooperation between Chinese and foreign enterprises.
translation_grid.option_c: China's government will keep on providing advantageous policies and conditions to push the further cooperation of Chinese and overseas enterprises.
translation_grid.option_d: The government of China will continue to offer favourable policies and conditions, promoting the further cooperation of Chinese and foreign enterprises.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "for promoting" 不如 "to promote" 表目的直接。C 项 "advantageous" 侧重 "有利的，有优势的"，不如 "favorable"（优惠的，有利的）贴合政策语境；"push" 不如 "promote" 正式。D 项 "promoting" 现在分词作状语，其逻辑主语是 "The government"，但句意是 "提供政策和条件" 这一行动旨在 "推动合作"，用不定式更佳。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 根据统计数据，中国消费者的消费需求正在从基本生活必需品转向对休闲、舒适和个人发展的需求
translation_grid.option_a: According to statistics, the demands of Chinese consumers are shifting from the basic necessities of life to leisure, comfort and personal development.
translation_grid.option_b: Based on statistical data, Chinese consumers' demands are changing from basic life necessities to leisure, comfort and personal development needs.
translation_grid.option_c: According to statistics, the demands of Chinese consumers is shifting from basic living necessities to leisure, comfort and personal development.
translation_grid.option_d: Statistical data shows that Chinese consumers' demand is changing from the basic necessities of life to leisure, comfort and personal development.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "needs" 在句尾冗余。C 项 "demands...is" 主谓不一致。D 项 "demand" 作为 "需求" 时常用复数 "demands"，且 "Statistical data shows" 不如 "According to statistics" 客观和常用。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 因此产品结构应做相应调整，以适应社会的发展
translation_grid.option_a: Therefore, the structure of products should be adjusted accordingly to adapt to social development.
translation_grid.option_b: So, the product structure should be adjusted correspondingly to fit the social development.
translation_grid.option_c: Thus, the structure of products ought to be adjusted accordingly, adapting to the development of society.
translation_grid.option_d: Therefore, the product structure must make corresponding adjustments to meet the development of society.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "fit the social development" 搭配不如 "adapt to social development" 常见。C 项 "adapting" 的逻辑主语是 "structure"，但 "结构" 本身不能 "适应"，应是 "被调整以适应"。D 项 "must" 语气过强，不如 "should" 符合原文；"make adjustments" 不如 "be adjusted" 简洁。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 另一方面，服务质量要改善，以满足人们提高生活质量的要求
translation_grid.option_a: On the other hand, services should be improved to satisfy people's demand for an improved quality of life.
translation_grid.option_b: On the other hand, the quality of service needs to be improved to meet people's requirement for a better life quality.
translation_grid.option_c: On another hand, service quality should be improved to satisfy people's demand for higher life quality.
translation_grid.option_d: On the other hand, services need to improve to meet people's demand for an improved quality of life.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "a better life quality" 词序应为 "a better quality of life"。C 项 "On another hand" 是错误表达，应为 "On the other hand"。D 项 "services need to improve" 主动语态错误，服务本身不能改善自己，应为 "need to be improved"。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 几千年来，端午节的特色在于吃粽子（glutinous dumplings）和赛龙舟，尤其是在一些河湖密布的南方省份
translation_grid.option_a: For thousands of years, the festival has been marked by glutinous dumplings and dragon boat races, especially in the southern provinces where there are many rivers and lakes.
translation_grid.option_b: For thousands of years, the characteristic of the Dragon Boat Festival is eating zongzi and dragon boat racing, especially in some southern provinces with dense rivers and lakes.
translation_grid.option_c: Over thousands of years, the festival is characterized by eating glutinous dumplings and holding dragon boat races, particularly in some southern provinces which have many rivers and lakes.
translation_grid.option_d: For thousands of years, the festival's feature is eating zongzi and dragon boat race, especially in some southern provinces that are rich in rivers and lakes.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "the characteristic...is" 现在时与 "For thousands of years" 时间背景不符。C 项 "is characterized by" 同样时态不当；"holding dragon boat races" 不如 "dragon boat races" 简洁。D 项 "the festival's feature is" 时态错误；"dragon boat race" 应用复数 "races"。

translation_grid.chinese_original: 今天高超的武术大师已遍布世界各地，武术爱好者也与日俱增
translation_grid.option_a: Today superb wushu masters are active all over the world, and amateurs are on the increase with each passing day.
translation_grid.option_b: Today, superb martial arts masters are all over the world, and the number of wushu lovers are increasing daily.
translation_grid.option_c: Nowadays, excellent wushu masters can be found around the globe, and martial arts enthusiasts are growing.
translation_grid.option_d: Today, highly skilled wushu masters have spread all over the world, and the amateur of wushu is increasing day by day.
translation_grid.analysis: B 项 "the number...are" 主谓不一致。C 项 "enthusiasts are growing" 搭配不当，是 "数量" 在增长，而不是 "人" 本身在增长。D 项 "the amateur" 应用复数 "amateurs" 或 "the number of amateurs"。
